name: DailyHaikuDigest2
0:
”Alexa, open daily haiku digest”
”Alexa, load daily haiku digest”
”Alexa, ask daily haiku digest”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily haiku digest
des: Daily Haiku Digest is an easy-to-use application that allows users to enjoy haikus on a variety of themes and topics. whether you're looking for something lighthearted and funny, or romantic and somber, this app caters to all tastes and preferences. By using Alexa, Daily Haiku Digest can generate a poem for you on command, making it a convenient and enjoyable experiences. The app's straightforward design ensures that people of all ages can use it with ease. Daily Haiku Digest aims to offer a brief yet meaningful escape from your daily routine by presenting you with thoughtfully crafted haikus. This simple app can bring a moment of relaxation and reflection to your day!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
